body: Volunteer          Do you have a passion for history?  Enjoy working with the public?  A special skill you'd like to share?  A few hours to spare?        New Bedford Whaling NHP volunteers assist with programs, staffing, and many other duties.   If you answered "Yes" to any one of these questions, you may be interested in volunteering at New Bedford Whaling National Historical Park. For more information about volunteer opportunities at the park click here
title: New Bedford Whaling National Historical Park: Volunteer
